Action.Name: Index
Action.Title: 列表

Command.Name: 列表页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <IndexPageActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="IndexPage"> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="toolbar-panel" PageID="P01043"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-search" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-search',plain:true" Title="检索" ActionValue="2" Action="showActDlg('检索','/Page/P01043/Search',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-detail" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-detail',plain:true" Title="查看" ActionValue="4" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','查看','/Page/P01043/Detail',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-create" Class="easyui-linkbutton normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-add',plain:true" Title="新增" ActionValue="8" Action="showActDlg('新增','/Page/P01043/Create',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-edit" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolradio normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-edit',plain:true" Title="修改" ActionValue="16" Action="showActDlg_DGItemActDlg('datagrid','修改','/Page/P01043/Edit',400,300)" /> <UIButton ID="btn-delete" Class="easyui-linkbutton toolmultiple normal-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel',plain:true" Title="删除" ActionValue="32" Action="showActDlg_DGItemsConfirm('datagrid','删除','确认删除选择项？','/Page/P01043/Delete',400,300)" /> <UIButton /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> <DataGrid Tag="table" ID="datagrid" Class="easyui-datagrid" Options="url:'/Page/P01043/Query',fitColumns:true,fit:true,pagination: true,rownumbers: true,nowrap: true,striped: true,collapsible: false,resizable:true,onClickRow:oncheckstate,onSelect:oncheckstate,onCheck:oncheckstate,onCheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheckAll:oncheckstate,onUncheck:oncheckstate,onUnselect:oncheckstate" Key="LvID"> <Column Title="LvID" FieldName="LvID" IsCheckBox="true" /> <Column Title="假类代号" FieldName="ID" /> <Column Title="假类名称" FieldName="LeaveName" /> <Column Options="formatter:function(value,row,index){return value.toFixed(2)}" HAlign="Right" Title="计算比率" FieldName="Coefficient" /> <Column Title="备注" FieldName="Remark" /> </DataGrid> </Page> </IndexPageActionCommand>

Action.Name: Search
Action.Title: 检索

Command.Name: 检索页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="假类名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" ID="LeaveName" Name="LeaveName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="LeaveName" IsRequired="false" Length="20" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01043"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-query" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="2" Action="submitAct_DGReplace('dataform','/Page/P01043/Query','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Query
Action.Title: 检索
Action.Command: <ScalarCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="执行查询" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_LeaveType" CommandName="QueryCount" SqlType="Scalar"> <Parameter Name="LeaveName" Path="Request[LeaveName]" Type="Parameter" /> </ScalarCommand>

<QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="搜索结果" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_LeaveType" CommandName="QueryPage"> <Parameter Name="LeaveName" Path="Request[LeaveName]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Page" Path="Request[Page]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Rows" Path="Request[Rows]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="rows" Path="Results[执行查询].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行查询].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行查询].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="total" Path="Results[查询总数].Value" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: Detail
Action.Title: 查看
Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="查看页面" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_LeaveType" CommandName="GetDetail"> <Parameter Name="LvID" Path="Request[ID]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

Command.Name: 查看页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="LastResult.Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="假类代号" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="LvID" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="LvID" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="4" /> </Field> <Field Title="假类名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="LeaveName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="LeaveName" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="20" /> </Field> <Field Title="计算比率" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Coefficient" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="Coefficient" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" /> </Field> <Field Title="备注" FieldClass="edit-field-r2" ContentClass="edit-content-r2" FieldType="TextArea"> <TextArea Tag="input" Name="Remark" Class="edit-input-r2 easyui-textbox" Style="height:90px" Options="multiline:true" Binding="Remark" IsReadOnly="true" IsRequired="false" Length="200" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01043"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="关闭" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Create
Action.Title: 新增

Command.Name: 新增页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="假类名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="LeaveName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Options="required:true,missingMessage:'请输入假类名称',validType:'length[0,20]',invalidMessage:'假类名称不得超过20个字符'" Binding="LeaveName" Length="20" /> </Field> <Field Title="计算比率" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Coefficient" Class="edit-input easyui-numberspinner" Options="min:0,max:1,precision:2,increment:0.05,required:true,missingMessage:'请设计算比率'" Binding="Coefficient" /> </Field> <Field Title="备注" FieldClass="edit-field-r2" ContentClass="edit-content-r2" FieldType="TextArea"> <TextArea Tag="input" Name="Remark" Class="edit-input-r2 easyui-textbox" Style="height:90px" Options="multiline:true,validType:'length[0,200]',invalidMessage:'备注不得超过200个字符'" Binding="Remark" IsRequired="false" Length="200" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01043"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-add" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="8" Action="submitAct_DGAppend('dataform','/Page/P01043/Add','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Add
Action.Title: 新增

Command.Name: 执行新增
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[执行新增].Json

Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="新增结果" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_LeaveType" CommandName="Add" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="LvID" Path="SerialCode" Type="SystemParameter" DefaultValue="LvID,L,4" /> <Parameter Name="LeaveName" Path="Request[LeaveName]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Coefficient" Path="Request[Coefficient]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Remark" Path="Request[Remark]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="CreatedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行新增].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行新增].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行新增].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: Edit
Action.Title: 修改
Action.Command: <QueryCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="编辑页面" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_LeaveType" CommandName="GetEdit"> <Parameter Name="LvID" Path="Request[ID]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryCommand>

Command.Name: 编辑页面
Command.Description: 这个命令会直接返回到客户端，无需后继命令

Action.Command: <EditDialogActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/html"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[查询编辑].Items" Type="Parameter" /> <Page SettingType="EditDialog"> <Form ID="dataform" Class="form-dialog" DataBinding="Parameters[Data]"> <TableLayout /> <Fields> <Field Title="假类代号" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="LvID" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="LvID" IsReadOnly="true" Length="4" /> </Field> <Field Title="假类名称" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="LeaveName" Class="edit-input easyui-textbox" Binding="LeaveName" IsReadOnly="true" Length="20" /> </Field> <Field Title="计算比率" FieldType="TextBox"> <Input Tag="input" Name="Coefficient" Class="edit-input easyui-numberspinner" Options="min:0,max:1,precision:2,increment:0.05,required:true,missingMessage:'请设计算比率'" Binding="Coefficient" /> </Field> <Field Title="备注" FieldClass="edit-field-r2" ContentClass="edit-content-r2" FieldType="TextArea"> <TextArea Tag="input" Name="Remark" Class="edit-input-r2 easyui-textbox" Style="height:90px" Options="multiline:true,validType:'length[0,200]',invalidMessage:'备注不得超过200个字符'" Binding="Remark" IsRequired="false" Length="200" /> </Field> </Fields> <ToolBar Tag="div" ID="toolbar" Class="dialog-button" PageID="P01043"> <Buttons> <UIButton ID="btn-update" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-ok'" Title="确定" ActionValue="16" Action="submitAct_DGUpdate('dataform','/Page/P01043/Update','datagrid')" /> <UIButton ID="btn-cancel" Class="easyui-linkbutton edit-button" Options="iconCls:'icon-cancel'" Title="取消" Action="cancel()" /> </Buttons> </ToolBar> </Form> </Page> </EditDialogActionCommand>

Action.Name: Update
Action.Title: 修改

Command.Name: 执行更新
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[执行更新].Json

Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="编辑结果" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_LeaveType" CommandName="Update" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="LvID" Path="Request[LvID]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="LeaveName" Path="Request[LeaveName]" Type="Parameter" Converter="Trim" /> <Parameter Name="Coefficient" Path="Request[Coefficient]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="Remark" Path="Request[Remark]" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedUser" Path="CurrentUserID" Type="SystemParameter" /> <Parameter Name="ModifiedTime" Path="CurrentDateTime" Type="SystemParameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="text/xml"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行更新].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="IsError" Path="Results[执行更新].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行更新].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>

Action.Name: Delete
Action.Title: 删除

Command.Name: 执行删除
Command.Description: 本查询的结果值为JSON，参数路径为Results[执行删除].Json

Action.Command: <QueryJsonCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" NextCommand="删除结果" GroupName="人事管理" TableName="hr_LeaveType" CommandName="Delete" SqlType="QueryJson"> <Parameter Name="LvID" Path="Request[keys]" Type="Parameter" /> </QueryJsonCommand>

<JsonActionCommand xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" ContentType="application/json"> <Parameter Name="Data" Path="Results[执行删除].Json" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="HasError" Path="Results[执行删除].IsError" Type="Parameter" /> <Parameter Name="ErrorMessage" Path="Results[执行删除].ErrorMessage" Type="Parameter" /> </JsonActionCommand>
